name: fruitsorvegetables
0:
”Alexa open fruits or vegetables”
”I want a big blue vegetable”
”Tell me more”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fruits or vegetables
des:
A fruit and vegetable store where you can search for a particular one. You can ask for small, medium or large sized fruits or vegetables.
You can also ask for a specific color such are red, green, blue, yellow, orange or white.
Colors such as violet, purple, indigo etc are mapped to blue as well. If you want to change one of these parameters, the context carries over as well.
You can also ask for the recommended fruit/vegetable's description.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
